ProjectDescr.Title: Comprehensive study on the phenomenon of mutation accumulation in the individual level
ProjectDescr.Description: The cause of aging still remains unknown. The recent human aging studies tend to utilize cross-sectional data of different age group despite the different environmental confounding factors accumulated on them in the long aging process. Therefore, we investigated the eight healthy male cynomolgus macaques, the monkeys meticulously shielded from the factors except aging. The annual sampling was designed with two individuals in each four age groups.

Grant.Title: Comprehensive study on the phenomenon of mutation accumulation in the individual level

Organization.Name: Korea Research Institute of Bioscience and Biotechnology
